channel.title: games on Jason Scheirer
channel.description: Recent content in games on Jason Scheirer

item.title: Trump Run: A Game
item.description: I wrote a game inspired by a tweet a coworker shared on a work Slack channel a few weeks back. It’s Webassembly using ebitengine.

item.title: Jumpbear: the Global Warming Bear
item.description: I wrote a handful of different things on my paternity leave, but one of the more interesting ones was this small TIC-80 game where you play a bear.
